pr_title: Further rework of the RestoreRedundancy data objects for serialization

timeline.message: Converting a Duration to a Long because of Serialization
Converting a Duration to a Long because of Serialization

timeline.bodyText: This could be replaced with totalPrimaryTransferTime += details.getPrimaryTransferTime();
timeline.author: DonalEvans

timeline.bodyText: This test sets multiple fields but does not verify all of them. Would it be possible to confirm that all data in the object is correctly serialized and deserialized, not just the message and status fields?
timeline.author: DonalEvans

timeline.bodyText: This can be replaced with totalPrimaryTransferTime += results.getTotalPrimaryTransferTime();
timeline.author: DonalEvans

timeline.bodyText: you can use assertJ's isEqualToComparingFieldByField method to compare all the fields are the same
